languages.text: "Согласно данным вокс-перехвата, Фабрикатор-Цензор планеты внес //некорректные//богохульные// изменения в процедуры работы мануфакторумов, что расценивается, как грехопадение. Адептус Механикус официально уведомляют династию фон Валанциус, что начато //расследование//операция по устранению// Фабрикатор-Цензора Кубиса Дельфима. Расчетное время завершения процедуры... три целых семь десятых солярного года".

"According to vox interception data, the planet's Fabricator-Censor made //incorrect//blasphemous// modifications to manufactorum working procedures, which qualifies as a lapse into sacrilege. The Adeptus Mechanicus are hereby officially notifying House von Valancius of having commenced an //investigation into//operation to remove// Fabricator-Censor Cubis Delphim. Estimated time to procedure completion... three point seven solar years."
languages.original_text: "Согласно данным вокс-перехвата, Фабрикатор-Цензор планеты внес //некорректные//богохульные// изменения в процедуры работы мануфакторумов, что расценивается, как грехопадение. Адептус Механикус официально уведомляют династию фон Валанциус, что начато //расследование//операция по устранению// Фабрикатор-Цензора Кубиса Дельфима. Расчетное время завершения процедуры... три целых семь десятых солярного года".

languages.text: 「ヴォクスの傍受データによると、惑星のファブリケーター・センサーが聖工場の稼働手順に//不適切な//罰当たりな//変更を加えたということだ。これはつまり冒涜にあたる。帝国技術局はこれにより、フォン・ヴァランシウス家に、ファブリケータ―・センサー・キュビス・デルフィム//に対する捜査//を除去する作業//を開始することを告知する。手順完了までの推定時間は…3.7太陽年」
languages.original_text: "According to vox interception data, the planet's Fabricator-Censor made //incorrect//blasphemous// modifications to manufactorum working procedures, which qualifies as a lapse into sacrilege. The Adeptus Mechanicus are hereby officially notifying House von Valancius of having commenced an //investigation into//operation to remove// Fabricator-Censor Cubis Delphim. Estimated time to procedure completion... three point seven solar years."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴォクスの傍受データによると、惑星のファブリケーター・センサーが聖工場の稼働手順に//不適切な//罰当たりな//変更を加えたということだ。これはつまり冒涜にあたる。帝国技術局はこれにより、フォン・ヴァランシウス家に、ファブリケータ―・センサー・キュビス・デルフィム//に対する捜査//を除去する作業//を開始することを告知する。手順完了までの推定時間は…3.7太陽年」
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: “截获的音阵数据显示，那颗行星的铸造审查师对制造工厂的加工程序进行了错误的//亵渎性的//修改，这属于亵渎神明的行为。机械修会在此正式通知冯·瓦兰修斯家族，已经对铸造审查师库比斯·德尔菲姆的行为开展//调查工作//移除准备//，预计完成此程序需要的时间为……三点七个太阳年。”
languages.original_text: "According to vox interception data, the planet's Fabricator-Censor made //incorrect//blasphemous// modifications to manufactorum working procedures, which qualifies as a lapse into sacrilege. The Adeptus Mechanicus are hereby officially notifying House von Valancius of having commenced an //investigation into//operation to remove// Fabricator-Censor Cubis Delphim. Estimated time to procedure completion... three point seven solar years."

traits.locale_text: “截获的音阵数据显示，那颗行星的铸造审查师对制造工厂的加工程序进行了错误的//亵渎性的//修改，这属于亵渎神明的行为。机械修会在此正式通知冯·瓦兰修斯家族，已经对铸造审查师库比斯·德尔菲姆的行为开展//调查工作//移除准备//，预计完成此程序需要的时间为……三点七个太阳年。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Gemäß abgefangener Vox-Daten hat der Fabricator-Zensor des Planeten //falsche//blasphemische// Modifikationen an den Manufactorum-Arbeitsprozessen vorgenommen, was als Absturz ins Sakrileg zu werten ist. Das Adeptus Mechanicus informiert hiermit offiziell das Haus von Valancius darüber, dass eine Operation eingeleitet wurde, um Fabricator-Zensor Cubis Delphim zu //untersuchen//entfernen//. Geschätzte Zeit bis zum Abschluss des Vorgangs ... 3,7 Solarjahre."
languages.original_text: "According to vox interception data, the planet's Fabricator-Censor made //incorrect//blasphemous// modifications to manufactorum working procedures, which qualifies as a lapse into sacrilege. The Adeptus Mechanicus are hereby officially notifying House von Valancius of having commenced an //investigation into//operation to remove// Fabricator-Censor Cubis Delphim. Estimated time to procedure completion... three point seven solar years."

traits.locale_text: "Gemäß abgefangener Vox-Daten hat der Fabricator-Zensor des Planeten //falsche//blasphemische// Modifikationen an den Manufactorum-Arbeitsprozessen vorgenommen, was als Absturz in die Gottlosigkeit zu werten ist. Das Adeptus Mechanicus informiert hiermit offiziell das Haus von Valancius darüber, dass eine Operation eingeleitet wurde, um Fabricator-Zensor Cubis Delphim zu //untersuchen//entfernen//. Geschätzte Zeit bis zum Abschluss des Vorgangs ... 3,7 Solarjahre."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: « D'après les données d'interception vox, le fabricator-censeur de la planète a procédé à des modifications //erronées//blasphématoires// des protocoles de fonctionnement du manufactorum, ce qui constitue un sacrilège. Par la présente délégation, l'Adeptus Mechanicus informe officiellement la maison von Valancius de l'instruction d'une //enquête//opération de retrait// du fabricator-censeur Cubis Delphim. Délai estimé avant l'achèvement de la procédure... 3,7 années solaires. »
languages.original_text: "According to vox interception data, the planet's Fabricator-Censor made //incorrect//blasphemous// modifications to manufactorum working procedures, which qualifies as a lapse into sacrilege. The Adeptus Mechanicus are hereby officially notifying House von Valancius of having commenced an //investigation into//operation to remove// Fabricator-Censor Cubis Delphim. Estimated time to procedure completion... three point seven solar years."

traits.locale_text: « D'après les données d'interception vox, le fabricator-censeur de la planète a procédé à des modifications //erronées//blasphématoires// des protocoles de fonctionnement du manufactorum, ce qui constitue un crime d'hérésie qualifié. Par la présente délégation, l'Adeptus Mechanicus informe officiellement la maison von Valancius de l'instruction d'une //enquête//opération de retrait// du fabricator-censeur Cubis Delphim. Délai estimé avant l'achèvement de la procédure... 3,7 années solaires. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: «Según los datos de voco interceptados, el fabricator-censor del planeta llevó a cabo modificaciones //incorrectas//blasfemas// en los procedimientos de trabajo del manufactorum, lo que supone un acto de sacrilegio. El Adeptus Mechanicus notifica oficialmente a la casa von Valancius de que ha abierto una //investigación del//operación para deshabilitar al// fabricator-censor Cubis Delphim. Tiempo estimado para la finalización del procedimiento: tres coma siete años solares».
languages.original_text: "According to vox interception data, the planet's Fabricator-Censor made //incorrect//blasphemous// modifications to manufactorum working procedures, which qualifies as a lapse into sacrilege. The Adeptus Mechanicus are hereby officially notifying House von Valancius of having commenced an //investigation into//operation to remove// Fabricator-Censor Cubis Delphim. Estimated time to procedure completion... three point seven solar years."

traits.locale_text: «Según los datos de voco interceptados, el fabricator-censor del planeta llevó a cabo modificaciones //incorrectas//blasfemas// en los procedimientos de trabajo del manufactorum, lo que supone un lapsus que raya en la blasfemia. El Adeptus Mechanicus notifica oficialmente a la casa von Valancius de que ha abierto una //investigación del//operación para deshabilitar al// fabricator-censor Cubis Delphim. Tiempo estimado para la finalización del procedimiento: tres coma siete años solares».
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Engellediğimiz voks verilerine göre gezegenin Denetçi Fabrikatör'ü, manufaktorumun çalışma prosedürlerinde; kutsala hürmetsizlik olarak değerlendirilen, //yanlış//kâfirce// modifikasyonlar yapmış. Adeptus Mechanicus, Denetçi Fabrikatör Cubis Delphim hakkında bir //inceleme//konumundan alma işlemi// başlattığını resmî olarak von Valancius Hanesi'ne bildirmektedir. Prosedürün tahminî tamamlanma süresi: Üç virgül yedi güneş yılı."
languages.original_text: "According to vox interception data, the planet's Fabricator-Censor made //incorrect//blasphemous// modifications to manufactorum working procedures, which qualifies as a lapse into sacrilege. The Adeptus Mechanicus are hereby officially notifying House von Valancius of having commenced an //investigation into//operation to remove// Fabricator-Censor Cubis Delphim. Estimated time to procedure completion... three point seven solar years."

traits.locale_text: "Engellediğimiz voks verilerine göre gezegenin Denetçi Fabrikatör'ü, manufaktorumun çalışma prosedürlerinde, din dışılık olarak değerlendirilen, //yanlış//kâfirce// modifikasyonlar yapmış. Adeptus Mechanicus, Denetçi Fabrikatör Cubis Delphim hakkında bir //inceleme//konumundan alma işlemi// başlattığı konusunda şu an resmî olarak von Valancius Hanesi'ni bilgilendirmektedir. Prosedürün tahminî tamamlanma süresi: Üç nokta yedi güneş yılı."
traits.speaker: Opticon22
